data.author: Game Time

changelog.release_notes:
-Adds Sombra plus 5 additional skins for watches that support color.
-Adds Bastion Tombstone to watches that support color.

-Added Master Key support
-Added hide feature to config settings when you choose 'Off' for Flick
-Improved Junkrat and McCree color sprites

-Improved Black and White Hero Sprites
-Added New Black and White Hero Skins

Added option to customize the ground, sky, and text color.
Improved layout for Pebble Round.
Removed shadow.
Added outline for sun and moon.

-Updated for Pebble 2

-Added 'N/A' status when the temperature is not available.
Fixed issue that caused hero and background images from not displaying at times.

-High Noon issue fixed
-McCree will no longer appear when High Noon appears, only the text 'High Noon' will appear.

-Added Ana to the Hero roster.
-Made slight modifications to help reduce RAM usage.

-Added Output configuration, allows users to choose what data they would like to view.
-Added daily step count
-Added Weekday abbreviation

-Updated configuration page to clay, can now be access offline.
-Added over 80 new skins for Heroes.
-Removed API weather notification.
Minor updates to graphics. Winston's face was redone for Pebble Time and Round. Characters on the original Pebble now have a white outline around them.
Fixed minor issue with Flick Settings not persisting after leaving the watchface. Improved auto hide option and battery life tweaks. Added Weather Underground provider.
Weather now requires a free API Key to access. You can sign up for a free API at Openweathermap.org and input your API Key in the settings page.

Fixed issue with weather updating properly. Added weather update interval settings (15, 30, and 45 minutes).
Added Flick settings, Off will prevent the flick action from displaying the battery and bluetooth, Toggle will display battery and bluetooth, then requires another flick to return to the date and temperature. Auto Hide will show the battery and bluetooth for 4 seconds before returning back to the date and temperature.

1.1  Added battery life and Bluetooth indicator. To activate this simply flick your wrist and the current Bluetooth state and battery life will take place of the Date and Temperature. Flick again to return to the Date and Temperature. The Bluetooth connected vibration is now removed, but the Bluetooth vibration when disconnected will remain the same.

data.description:
Welcome to Overwatch GT!

Features

-Choose your Hero-

Set what hero you'd like displayed on the watchface or if you like leave on random and it will swap the heroes out each hour. Over 80  skins to choose from!

-Weather-

Weather will require a free API Key from Openweathermap.org Wunderground.com.

Using GPS or typing in your current city you'll be given the current temperature in either Fahrenheit or Celsius. Choose your weather update intervals between 15, 30, and 45 minutes.

-Master Key-

Master Key is now available to make adding your API Key for weather easy and efficient. Visit pmkey.xyz and sign up today!

-Background Change-

Through out the day the background will change showing the sun and the moon.

-Hourly Vibration-

Each hour get a vibration reminder letting you know what time it is.
Don't like the vibration, feel free to turn it off in the settings.

-Flick Feature-

Flicking your wrist will show the current state of Bluetooth and the battery level for your watch. To return to the date and temperature simply flick again, easy! If you prefer you can change the settings for flick to be off or to use auto hide which displays for 4 seconds.


I hope you enjoy this simple design, if you do remember to leave a heart! 

The world could always use more heroes.

latest_release.release_notes:
-Adds Sombra plus 5 additional skins for watches that support color.
-Adds Bastion Tombstone to watches that support color.
